data.title: Reshmi Ghosh on LinkedIn: Never announced my team change formally — so on the eve of GA, I want to…
data.meta_description: Never announced my team change formally — so on the eve of GA, I want to say I couldn’t have been more thankful to the team of amazing people I get to work…
data.text:
So very many design choices, technical choices, and human-centered insights go into this. It's been really rewarding to get to work in what is essentially a new technological space. Not often do you get a chance to participate in shaping a novel new frontier, and the constant learning, speed of product building, and even the navigating the tension between how things have worked for decades and how they will work in the future is, well, exciting. Exhausting. Amazing. Addictive. Among the amazing opportunities and challenges in this work is how to generate useful human and user focused learning to shape the product making in a moment where the product on Monday is not at all what it is on Tuesday. Keeping pace with and getting ahead of the engineering and design choices has required seeing the problem space in a fundamental and broad manner, with a dash of seeing around corners and into the future.

#MicrosoftCopilot is a digital companion for your whole life that will create a single #Copilot user experience across Bing, Edge, Microsoft 365, and Windows. 😉 The new Copilot icon and user experience will start to roll out across all Copilots, first in Windows on September 26 and then in Microsoft 365 Copilot on November 12. In this page you will learn about: 💎 The features and benefits of Copilot in Windows, Bing Chat Enterprise, and #Microsoft365 Copilot, including the new hero experience: Microsoft 365 Chat. 🤩 The new Copilot experiences in the Microsoft 365 Apps that help you unlock productivity and unleash creativity with Copilot. 📙 The Copilot Lab, a learning platform to help you work iteratively with AI and get the most out of Microsoft 365 Copilot. 👉🏼 Learn more about how Copilot can help you to do your best work with the apps and experiences you rely on every day. I hope you enjoy reading it. 😊

🎭🎥Game changer? or Not Game Changer... that is the question... Microsoft's co-pilot seems to have level up their Game with integrating AI to truly make a difference in productivity through all things Microsoft... the question... is this a Game changer enough to make an impact to the 4th Industrial Revolution of Technology.... hmmm things to ponder... 👉👉would love to hear everyone's thoughts on this.. share yours in the comments 👇👇👇👇👇👇👇👇👇 #continuouslearning #AItools
